    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="no">Prosent kalkulator</string>
            <string language="en">Calculating percentage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechenprozentsatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourcentage calculateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porcentagem calculadora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percentuale calcolatrice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποσοστό υπολογισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porcentaje calculador</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">En kalkulator for å finne hvor mange prosent en verdi utgjør.</string>
            <string language="en">A calculator used to fine the percentage of a value.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">prosent</string>
            <string language="en">percentage</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Rechner verwendete zur Geldstrafe den 
Prozentsatz eines Wertes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une calculatrice a utilisé à l'amende le 
pourcentage d'une valeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma calculadora usou à multa a porcentagem de um
valor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un calcolatore ha usato all'indennità la 
percentuale di un valore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας υπολογιστής που χρησιμοποιείται για να 
τελειοποιήσει το ποσοστό μιας αξίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una calculadora utilizó a la multa el porcentaje
de un valor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozentsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pourcentage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">ποσοστό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
